text: Yesu nkuhweneha kutangola wachidoni, “Mwenu mmanu mma ku Yelusalemu, mmanu mma ku Yelusalemu! Mwenu mùvawalala manabii na kuvapanya mayanga avala vatumwîje kwenu mwenu. Myanda yohe ǹnilinga kuvalopolela pamo vana venu muchi ung'uku chavautamila vana vake paliungu dimapa dyake, henga mwenu nanga pamutamwije.
